EmailTemplate.description: This template will be used for sending rejection notifications once Data Steward rejects Term.
EmailTemplate.name: Data Steward Rejection Email for Term
EmailTemplate.subject: Term : Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Term__c.OwnerFullName},
The request for approval of Term '{!Term__c.Name}' have been rejected by Data Stewards. Please click here : {!Term__c.Link} to visit the Term.
Thank you, Salesforce
